group_1.textRight: It's great, isn't it? ...For both of them.
They were crying while they were talking,@but they're smiling in the end.

group_1.textLeft: ...Indeed.

group_1.textRight: By the way, I really like your way of thinking.

group_1.textLeft: ...I was just reflecting on what was said earlier,@though, with my lack of consideration.

group_1.textRight: Mm, it's because it's not some suspicious-sounding@sympathy that it really strikes the heart.

group_1.textLeft: ...I see. That's good, then.

group_1.textRight: I wonder if we'll get married too someday.

group_1.textLeft: Who knows...@...Though, I don't think it would be a bad thing.
In some cases having someone important to@you can allow you to become stronger.

group_1.textRight: That's what love is all about isn't it?

group_1.textLeft: That's right...and I don't want@you to get hurt, either.
...I would be sad if you were gone.

group_1.textRight: Whaâ€•?!

group_1.textLeft: I wonder if my parents worry@about me the same way...

group_1.textRight: A-ahh!@You meant that kind of love!
But yeah...love is about more than just marriage.
There's the love that you feel for your family, too.

group_1.textLeft: Right... This was a good experience.

group_1.textRight: ...Wait, we're acting like this is all over,
but we haven't done the photo shoot yet!@What do we do about costumes?!

group_1.textCenter: My dear models~!@Thank you for saving the bride-to-be!
You ready to start taking photos soon~?

group_1.textRight: [chara:350402:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Crap, he's coming this way!@Back to our school uniforms...

group_1.textLeft: ...Wait, Kokoro. Let's go like this.

group_1.textRight: What?!

group_1.textLeft: This is the perfect attire for@wedding photos, is it not?

group_1.textRight: ...It is?!@Eh, no...but...
Oho...these're your costumes...?!@How wonderful!

group_1.textLeft: A-ahaha...umm...@We managed somehow.

group_1.textRight: Managed...? How in the world...

group_1.textLeft: ...We don't have the time to discuss that now,@do we?
We didn't steal them or do anything illegal,@so don't worry.

group_1.textRight: Hm...then there's no problem...I guess?

group_1.textLeft: Correct, there is no problem.

group_1.textRight: Well...then...sure thing then!@Let's get the photo shoot going right away.
Your families and friends are waiting@for you right over there!
Pfft...ahaha!@Masara, you were so pushy!

group_1.textLeft: I'm a little surprised myself@at how smoothly that went.
Ah...Kokoro.

group_1.textRight: Hm?

group_1.textLeft: You have a lovely smile right now.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* Now that you mention it, so do you!

group_1.textLeft: I'm smiling?@...I didn't notice.
...It must be because I enjoy being with you.
Now, shall we go, Kokoro?

group_1.textRight: Going by our outfits, shouldn't I@be the one escorting you?

group_1.textLeft: It's fine either way.

group_1.textRight: ...I feel the same!

group_1.textLeft: Those outfits...@Are those their Magical Girl forms?

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* I suppose that means they understand@what it feels like to be getting married!

group_1.textLeft: Hmm, and what sort of feeling is that?

group_1.textRight: I don't know all the details, but...
From what I can see, perhaps some kind of feeling@of happiness, one that brings a smile to your face.

group_1.textLeft: They certainly do have wonderful smiles,@don't they?
Huh...but why does Kokoro look like a groom?

group_1.textRight: Hmm...I'm not sure, but her family, her friends...
Her desire to protect everyone's happy futures
may be why Kokoro looks the way she does,@you see.

group_1.textLeft: I get it...!
Yeah, they look super happy, don't they!

group_1.textCenter: Now then, try to capture the happy@expressions of a couple getting married...
...No, you know what, that's fine just the way it is.
